# 权谋通览

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/quanmou-tonglan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/quanmou-tonglan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install quanmou-tonglan
quanmou-tonglan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g quanmou-tonglan
quanmou-tonglan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
